siteMetadata.title: My Collection of Markdowns
siteMetadata.description: This is my collection of various documentation.

markdownRemark.html:
Some various shortcuts, standard or modified.

Ctrl+Alt+Tab : Switch windows of an application (e.g. Chrome to Chrome).

Super+Shift +LeftArrow/RightArrow : Move window one monitor to left/right.
